resources.string: Please enter yout email to be able to receive messages about your phone.
Turn on high accuracy location mode for best results
You must enter a minimum of 4 digits or dots for each unlock attempts. This is the minimum length required by Android.
Wait at least 10 seconds before entering the correct code, other wise Gotcha will discard the email.
Make sure you check your Spam folder and mark the emails as Not Spam sothe are delivered to your inbox.
When someone tries to unlock your device with the wrong code
"Gotcha emails you when someone tries to unlock your phone with thw wrong code. The email includes stealth photo taken with the front camera and a map showing the location of your phone. "
